templates.description: List of content template definitions for programmatic SEO.

templateIdea.description: Description or title of the template idea.

templateType.description: Category or strategy type for the template.

urlPattern.description: URL structure for generated pages, with variables in braces.

titleTemplate.description: Template for dynamic page title using variables.

metaDescriptionTemplate.description: Template for dynamic meta description using variables.

variables.description: Dictionary of variables used in the template.

Placeholder1.description: Placeholder - replace with the strict field you want

requiredDataPoints.description: List of required data or content assets needed to build the page.

contentSections.description: Section identifiers for how the page should be structured.

estimatedPages.description: Approximate number of pages that could be generated from this template.

priority.description: Relative build/publishing priority for the template.

intentType.description: Search intent primarily addressed by this template.

type.description: The expected type of the variable value.

dataSource.description: Established data source name or type for valid variable values.

examples.description: Sample values for the variable (if provided).

derived_from.description: Variable this is derived from (if applicable).
